full_summary:
===============

### Contract Award for Electric High Pressure Inline Process Heater

#### Alert for Tender Closing Time Extension

A correction has been made to the tender closing time for the contract award of Electric High Pressure Inline Process Heater. The revised closing time is **September 5, 2023 at 14:00 EDT**. All bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive. Therefore, please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.

#### Contract Overview

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design, supply, and delivery of an Electric High Pressure Inline Process Heater and controller capable of operating with the CanmetENERGY G2 Supercritical CO2 system. The creation and delivery of all related components are expected to be completed by **March 15, 2024**.

#### Key Documents and Deliverables

* Detailed specifications for the Electric High Pressure Inline Process Heater and controller
* Mandatory requirements for design, supply, and delivery
* Delivery logistics to a CanmetENERGY facility within the National Capital Area

#### Contract Details

* Contract Title: Electric High Pressure Inline Process Heater
* Solicitation Number: WS3985743969-Doc3993271214
* Amendment Number: 11
* Publication Date: May 12, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 3, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

#### Contact Information

For further inquiries or questions, please contact:

* Ian Arboleda (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [ian.arboleda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ian.arboleda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Means of Submission

Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Please note that complete supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by the revised closing time on September 5, 2023 at 14:00 EDT.

#### Trade Agreements and Regions

This contract is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The regions of opportunity and delivery are the National Capital Region (NCR). . Depending on
